<div class="hf-cell TOCLink">&#xa0;</div>

</div>
</div>

<div style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&#xa0;</div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 49pt;text-indent:-49pt;"><b>Item 2.02</b>&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;<b>Results of Operations and Financial Condition.</b></div>

<div style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&#xa0;</div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;text-indent:25pt;">On January 4, 2024, Conagra Brands, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) issued a press release which contained information on the Company&#8217;s&#xa0;second quarter fiscal&#xa0;2024 financial results. The press release is furnished with this Current Report on Form 8-K as Exhibit 99.1.</div>

<div style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&#xa0;</div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;text-indent:25pt;">The information furnished pursuant to Item 2.02 of this Current Report on Form 8-K, including Exhibit 99.1, shall not be deemed &#8220;filed&#8221; for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;), or otherwise subject to liabilities under that section and shall not be deemed to be incorporated by reference into any document filed under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, whether made before or after the date hereof, regardless of any general incorporation language in such filing.</div>

<div style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&#xa0;</div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 49pt;text-indent:-49pt;"><b>Item 9.01</b>&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;&#xa0;<b>Financial Statements and Exhibits.</b></div>

<div style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&#xa0;</div>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;font-variant:normal;text-align:center;margin:0pt;"><font style="text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 12pt;"><b>CONAGRA BRANDS REPORTS <a data-tblloc="66x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657299890245">second</a> QUARTER RESULTS</b></font></p>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">CHICAGO,&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="23x1" data-tblname="263812" data-tblv="9" id="led263812F202210161668633717688">January 4, 2024</a> &#8212; Today Conagra Brands, Inc. (NYSE: CAG) reported results for the&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="66x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657299913540">second</a> quarter of fiscal year <a data-tblloc="40x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657300438393">2024</a>, which ended on <a data-tblloc="3x1" data-tblname="263812" data-tblv="9" id="led263812F2022681657300060254">November 26, 2023</a>. All comparisons are against the prior-year fiscal period, unless otherwise noted.&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><u><b><a data-tblloc="55x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657299981268">Second Quarter</a></b>&nbsp;<b>Highlights</b></u></p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">

		<tr style="vertical-align: top;">
			<td style="width: 18pt;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="width: auto;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;">Net sales <a data-tblloc="2x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F202311111702323632047">decreased</a><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="2x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F202311111702323658733">3.2%</a><font style="color:#cc0000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="color:#333333;">from</font>&nbsp;the prior year quarter;&nbsp;organic net sales <a data-tblloc="3x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022781659981433768">decreased</a> <a data-tblloc="3x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022781659981445676">3.4%</a></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">

		<tr style="vertical-align: top;">
			<td style="width: 18pt;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="width: auto;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;">Operating margin&nbsp;was&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="15x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022781659985708482">14.0%,</a><font style="color:#ff0000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="color:#000000;">representing a&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="15x3" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F202311111702326151637">261</a><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;basis p</font>oin<font style="color:#000000;">t decrease o</font>ver the prior year quarter.&nbsp;Adjusted operating margin was&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="16x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022781659985751961">15.9%,</a>&nbsp;representing a&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="16x3" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F202211141671034614689">108</a>&nbsp;basis point&nbsp;decrease over the prior year quarter.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">

		<tr style="vertical-align: top;">
			<td style="width: 18pt;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="width: auto;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;"><font style="color:#333333;">Diluted earnings per share (EPS)&nbsp;was&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="13x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022781659985833544"><font style="color:#333333;">$0.60</font></a><font style="color:#333333;">, a 24.1% decrease&nbsp;</font><font style="color:#333333;">over the prior year quarter. Adjusted EPS was&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="14x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022781659985881027"><font style="color:#333333;">$0.71</font></a><font style="color:#333333;">, a&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="14x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F202211141671034730507"><font style="color:#333333;">12.3%</font></a><font style="color:#333333;">&nbsp;decrease over the prior year quarter.</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">

		<tr style="vertical-align: top;">

			</td>
			<td style="width: auto;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;"><font style="color:#333333;">The company is updating its fiscal </font><a data-tblloc="40x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657300438393"><font style="color:#333333;">2024</font></a><font style="color:#333333;"> guidance and now expects:</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">

		<tr style="vertical-align: top;">
			<td style="width: 18pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;">&#9675;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="width: auto;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">Organic net sales to decrease between 1.0% and 2.0% compared to fiscal 2023</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">

		<tr style="vertical-align: top;">

			<td style="width: 18pt;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">&#9675;</font></p>
			</td>
			<td style="width: auto;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">Adjusted operating margin of approximately 15.6%</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; text-indent: 0px;">

		<tr style="vertical-align: top;">
			<td style="width: 18pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="width: 18pt;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">&#9675;</font></p>
			</td>
			<td style="width: auto;">
			<p style="margin: 0pt; text-align: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">Adjusted EPS between $2.60 and $2.65</font></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt;"><b><u>CEO Perspective</u></b></p>

<p style="margin: 0pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt;">Sean Connolly, president and chief executive officer of Conagra Brands, commented, "Despite an ongoing challenging macro environment, we saw several positive signs in Q2. In particular, volume trends in our domestic retail business&nbsp;improved substantially, as inflation-driven volume declines were cut in half compared to Q1. Most importantly, our targeted investments in our frozen business generated strong lifts and market share gains. These developments reinforced our confidence in investing to build momentum in the second half and set up a strong FY25."</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 8pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Total Company&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="53x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657299993307">Second Quarter</a> Results</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">In the quarter, net sales were&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x1" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049165813">$3.2</a> billion reflecting:</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt;">

		<tr style="font-size: 11pt;">
			<td style="width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 10pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">a&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="6x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049248360">0.2%</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="6x7" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049261993">increase</a> from the favorable impact of foreign exchange; and</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt;">

		<tr style="font-size: 11pt;">
			<td style="width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 10pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">a&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049282727">3.4%</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x7" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049309446">decrease</a> in organic net sales.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">The&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049334186">3.4%</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x7" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049359561">decrease</a> in organic net sales was driven by a&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049379536">0.5%</a> negative impact from&nbsp;price/mix, partially attributable to an increase in strategic&nbsp;investments, and a&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="8x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049390922">2.9%</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="8x7" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660049403285">decrease</a> in volume, primarily due to continued lower consumption trends.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
<div class="PGFTR" style="text-align: center; width: 100%">
<div class="hf-row">
<div class="hf-cell PGNUM">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
</div>

<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; border: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000">
<div class="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%">
<div class="hf-row">
<div class="hf-cell TOCLink"><b>CONAGRA BRANDS</b></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>Page 2</b></p>

<p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Gross profit&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x5" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049499647">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049508835">8.2%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049519257">$847</a> million in the quarter, and adjusted gross profit&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x5" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049823859">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049833892">7.6%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049842458">$862</a> million.&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="55x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657300031982">Second quarter</a> gross profit decreased as higher productivity was more than offset by the&nbsp;negative impacts of cost of goods sold inflation, lower organic net sales, and unfavorable operating leverage.&nbsp;Gross margin&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="5x5" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049875311">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="5x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049885768">145</a> basis points to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="4x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049898776">26.4%</a> in the quarter, and adjusted gross margin&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="7x5" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049914074">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="7x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049924191">129</a> basis points to <a data-tblloc="6x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049932524">26.9%</a>.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Selling, general, and administrative expense (SG&amp;A), which includes advertising and promotional expense (A&amp;P),&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="8x5" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049962754">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="8x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049972518">6.8%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="8x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049981591">$398</a> million in the qu<font style="color:#333333;">arter due to an impairment associated with a business being reclassified to held for sale&nbsp;and legal reserve adjustments&nbsp;made in the quarter, partially offset by a decline in A&amp;P from timing shifts over the prior year quarter.&nbsp;A</font>djusted SG&amp;A, which excludes A&amp;P,&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x5" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660049996959">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660050005761">4.1%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660050019689">$279</a> million primarily&nbsp;<font style="color:#000000;">driven by lower incentive compensation&nbsp;compared to&nbsp;the prior year quarter.</font></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Net interest expense was&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x1" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F2022791660050151152">$113</a> million in the quarter. Compared to the prior-year period, net interest expense&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x6" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F2022791660050170543">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x5" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F2022791660050179416">13.0%</a> or&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x3" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F2022791660050187647">$13</a> m<font style="color:#333333;">illion, primarily due to a higher weighted average interest rate on outstanding debt.</font></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">The average diluted share count in the quarter was&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x1" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F2022791660050327584">480</a> million shares.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;">In the quarter, net income attributable to Conagra Brands decreased 25.1% to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="11x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660050393587">$286</a> million, or&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="13x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660050408870">$0.60</a> per diluted share compared to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="11x2" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F202311121702400708678">$382</a>&nbsp;million, or&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="13x2" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F202311121702400734151">$0.79</a> per diluted share in the prior year quarter driven primarily by the decrease in gross profit and increase in SG&amp;A, as previously discussed. Adjusted net income attributable to Conagra Brands&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="12x5" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660050427061">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="12x4" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660051208036">12.9%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="12x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660051216702">$341</a> million, or&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="14x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F2022791660051225596">$0.71</a> per diluted share driven primarily&nbsp;by the decrease in gross profit.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Adjusted EBITDA, which includes equity method investment earnings and pension and postretirement non-service expense (income),&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x5" data-tblname="263861" data-tblv="9" id="led263861F2022791660051274036">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x4" data-tblname="263861" data-tblv="9" id="led263861F2022791660051283076">7.0%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x1" data-tblname="263861" data-tblv="9" id="led263861F2022791660051294195">$661</a> million in the quarter, primarily driven by the decrease in adjusted gross profit.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Grocery &amp; Snacks Segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="53x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657299999539">Second Quarter</a> Results</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Reported and organic net sales for the Grocery &amp; Snacks segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="10x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660051335237">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="10x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660051343571">4.1%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="10x1" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F2022791660051355324">$1.3</a> billion in the quarter&nbsp;driven by a price/mix decrease of&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="14x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660834530115">0.4%</a>, partially attributable to an increase in strategic&nbsp;investments, coupled with&nbsp;<font style="color:#000000;">a volume decrease of&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="13x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660834559215">3.7%</a><font style="color:#000000;">,&nbsp;</font>primarily due to continued lower consumption trends.<font style="color:#000000;"> The company gained dollar share in snacking and staples categories including microwave popcorn and seeds,&nbsp;chili, and hot cocoa.&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Operating profit for the segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835300580">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835314034">18.0%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="2x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835328717">$279</a> million in the quarter. Adjusted operating profit&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835351847">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835364347">17.3%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="3x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835378757">$282</a> million&nbsp;as productivity was more than offset by the negative impacts of cost of goods sold inflation, lower organic net sales, unfavorable operating leverage, and&nbsp;higher A&amp;P and SG&amp;A.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Refrigerated &amp; Frozen Segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="53x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657300003588">Second Quarter</a> Results</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Reported and organic net sales for the Refrigerated &amp; Frozen segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="15x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663088117935">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="15x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663088127664">5.8%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="15x1" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663088149020">$1.3</a> billion in th<font style="color:#000000;">e quarter as price mix&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="19x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845796630">decreased</a><font style="color:#000000">&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="19x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845814175">2.5%</a><font style="color:#000000;">, partially attributable to an increase in strategic investments, and volume&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="18x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845828718">decreased</a><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="18x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845838199">3.3%</a><font style="color:#000000;">,&nbsp;</font>primarily due to continued lower consumption trends.&nbsp;<font style="color:#000000;">The company gained dollar share in select categories such as frozen sides and&nbsp;frozen breakfast and gained unit share in frozen single serve meals.</font></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div class="PGBK" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
<div class="PGFTR" style="text-align: center; width: 100%">
<div class="hf-row">
<div class="hf-cell PGNUM">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; border: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000">
<div class="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%">
<div class="hf-row">
<div class="hf-cell TOCLink"><b>CONAGRA BRANDS</b></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>Page 3</b></p>

<p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Operating profit for the segment <a data-tblloc="4x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F202311111702324213515">decreased</a><font style="color:#ff0000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="color:#000000;"><a data-tblloc="4x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F202311111702324248088">12.0%</a></font>&nbsp;to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="4x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835426566">$220</a> million in the quarter. Adjusted operating profit&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="5x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835439908">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="5x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835449131">14.2%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="5x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835460673">$222</a> million as productivity and lower A&amp;P were&nbsp;more than offset by the negative impacts of unfavorable operating leverage,&nbsp;lower organic net sales, cost of goods sold inflation, and increased&nbsp;SG&amp;A.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>International Segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="53x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657300008689">Second Quarter</a> Results</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Net sales for the International segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="20x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663087917870">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="20x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663087940696">8.1%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="20x1" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663087957030">$280</a> million in the quarter reflecting:</p>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt;">

		<tr style="font-size: 11pt;">
			<td style="width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 10pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">a&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="22x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663087990863">2.5%</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="22x7" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663088041710">increase</a> from the favorable impact of foreign exchange; and</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt;">

		<tr style="font-size: 11pt;">
			<td style="width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; width: 18pt; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 10pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&#9679;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: top; font-size: 11pt;">
			<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">a&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="21x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663088009216">5.6%</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="21x7" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20228131663088025049">increase</a> in organic net sales.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">On an organic net sales basis, price/mix&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="25x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845865062">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="25x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845876742">2.3%</a> and volume&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="24x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845890712">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="24x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845906102">3.3%</a>&nbsp;primarily driven by a strong performance in the company's Mexico business.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Operating profit for the segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="6x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835480363">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="6x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835491457">84.0%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="6x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835507368">$6</a> million in the quarter primarily due to a<font style="color:#333333">n impairment associated with a business being reclassified to held for sale</font>. Adjusted operating profit&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="7x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835520838">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="7x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835529870">10.3%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="7x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835541056">$41</a> million as the benefits from higher organic net sales and&nbsp;productivity&nbsp;more than offset the negative impact&nbsp;of cost of goods sold inflation,&nbsp;and higher SG&amp;A and A&amp;P.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Foodservice Segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="53x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657300012778">Second Quarter</a> Results</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Reported and organic net sales for the Foodservice segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="26x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845944550">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="26x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845955102">4.3%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="26x1" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660845972046">$295</a> million in the quarter. Price/mix increased&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="30x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660846051858">6.8%</a>, primarily due to inflation-driven pricing actions taken in the prior year, and volume&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="29x6" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660846017711">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="29x4" data-tblname="263825" data-tblv="9" id="led263825F20227181660846029439">2.5%</a>.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Operating profit for the segment&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="8x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F202311121702423315911">increased</a><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><a data-tblloc="8x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F202311121702423353731">33.2%</a><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;t</font>o&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="8x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835595723">$38</a> million.&nbsp;Adjusted operating profit&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835613611">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835622376">24.3%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20227181660835631690">$35</a> million in the quarter as the benefits of higher organic net sales, productivity, and lower cost of goods sold inflation more than offset the impacts of unfavorable operating leverage and increased A&amp;P and SG&amp;A.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Other&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="53x1" data-tblname="263810" data-tblv="9" id="led263810F2022681657300016886">Second Quarter</a> Items</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Corporate expenses&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="10x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20228131663089724781">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="10x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20228131663089737077">10.9%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="10x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20228131663089748565">$95</a> million in the qua<font style="color:#333333;">rter and adjuste</font>d corporate expense&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="11x6" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20228131663089764461">decreased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="11x4" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20228131663089773144">31.9%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="11x1" data-tblname="263837" data-tblv="9" id="led263837F20228131663089783848">$70</a> million in the<font style="color:#333333;"> quarter driven primarily by lower incentive compensation compared to&nbsp;the prior year quarter.</font></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">We incurred pension and post-retirement non-service expense in the quarter compared&nbsp;to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="9x2" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F20227181660846339340">$6</a> million of income in the prior-year quarter due primarily to higher interest costs.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">In the quarter, equity method investment earnings&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="7x6" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F202311121702400913001">increased</a>&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="7x5" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F202311121702400923835">10.3%</a> to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="10x1" data-tblname="263814" data-tblv="9" id="led263814F20227181660846351987">$54</a> million reflecting continued strong product margins from the company's joint venture, Ardent Mills.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">In the quarter, the effective tax rate was&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="19x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F20227181660846611717">26.5%</a> compared to&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="19x2" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F20227181660846626747">24.3%</a> in the prior-year quarter. The adjusted effective tax rate was&nbsp;<a data-tblloc="20x1" data-tblname="263848" data-tblv="9" id="led263848F20227181660846645523">24.3%</a>, unchanged compared to&nbsp;the prior-year quarter.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">In the quarter, the company<font style="color:#333333;"> paid a dividend of $0.35&nbsp;per share.&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 10pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 8pt; text-indent: -9pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Outlook</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">The company is lowering its fiscal 2024 organic net sales growth, operating margin, and adjusted EPS outlook to reflect year-to-date results, expectations for a slower volume recovery, and&nbsp;increased brand investments in the second half of the fiscal year.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div class="hf-cell TOCLink"><b>CONAGRA BRANDS</b></div>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 11pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left;"><b>Page 5</b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Discussion of Results</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Conagra Brands will host a webcast and conference call at 9:30 a.m. Eastern time today to discuss the results. The live audio webcast and presentation slides will be available on <u>www.conagrabrands.com/investor-relations</u> under Events &amp; Presentations. The conference call may be accessed by dialing 1-877-883-0383 for participants in the U.S. and 1-412-902-6506 for all other participants and using passcode 9519988. Please dial in 10 to 15 minutes prior to the call start time. Following the company's remarks, the conference call will include a question-and-answer session with the investment community. A replay of the webcast will be available on www.conagrabrands.com/investor-relations under Events &amp; Presentations until January 4, 2025.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>About Conagra Brands</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Conagra Brands, Inc. (NYSE: CAG), headquartered in Chicago, is one of North America's leading branded food companies. Guided by an entrepreneurial spirit, Conagra Brands combines a rich heritage of making great food with a sharpened focus on innovation. The company's portfolio is evolving to satisfy people's changing food preferences. Conagra's iconic brands, such as Birds Eye&#174;, Duncan Hines&#174;, Healthy Choice&#174;, Marie&nbsp;Callender's&#174;, Reddi-wip&#174;, and&nbsp;Slim Jim&#174;, as well as emerging brands, including Angie's&#174; BOOMCHICKAPOP&#174;, Duke's&#174;, Earth Balance&#174;, Gardein&#174;, and Frontera&#174;, offer choices for every occasion. For more information, visit <u>www.conagrabrands.com</u>.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Note on Forward-Looking Statements</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">This document contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of the federal securities laws. These forward-looking statements are based on management's current expectations and are subject to uncertainty and changes in circumstances. Readers of this document should understand that these statements are not guarantees of performance or results. Many factors could affect our actual financial results and cause them to vary materially from the expectations contained in the forward-looking statements, including those set forth in this document. These risks, uncertainties, and factors include, among other things: risks associated with general economic and industry conditions, including inflation, rising interest rates, decreased availability of capital, volatility in financial markets, declining consumer spending rates, recessions, decreased energy availability, increased energy costs (including fuel surcharges), supply chain challenges, labor shortages, and geopolitical conflicts (including the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine); negative impacts caused by public health crises; risks related to our ability to deleverage on currently anticipated timelines, and to continue to access capital on acceptable terms or at all; risks related to the company's competitive environment, cost structure, and related market conditions; risks related to our ability to execute operating and value creation plans and achieve returns on our investments and targeted operating efficiencies from cost-saving initiatives, and to benefit from trade optimization programs; risks related to the availability and prices of commodities and other supply chain resources, including raw materials, packaging, energy, and transportation, including any negative effects caused by changes in levels of inflation and interest rates, weather conditions, health pandemics or outbreaks of disease, actual or threatened hostilities or war, or other geopolitical uncertainty; risks related to the effectiveness of our hedging activities and ability to respond to volatility in commodities; disruptions or inefficiencies in our supply chain and/or operations; risks related to the ultimate impact of, including reputational harm caused by, any product recalls and product liability or labeling litigation, including litigation related to lead-based paint and pigment and cooking spray; risks related to our ability to respond to changing consumer preferences and the success of our innovation and marketing investments; risks associated with actions by our customers, including changes in distribution and purchasing terms; risks related to the seasonality of our business; risks associated with our co-manufacturing arrangements and other third-party service provider dependencies; risks associated with actions of governments and regulatory bodies that affect our businesses, including the ultimate impact of new or revised regulations or interpretations including to address climate change or implement changes to taxes and tariffs; risks related to the company's ability to execute on its strategies or achieve expectations related to environmental, social, and governance matters, including as a result of evolving legal, regulatory, and other standards, processes, and assumptions, the pace of scientific and technological developments, increased costs, the availability of requisite financing, and changes in carbon pricing or carbon taxes; risks related to a material failure in or breach of our or our vendors' information technology systems and other cybersecurity incidents; risks related to our ability to identify, attract, hire, train, retain and develop qualified personnel; risk of increased pension, labor or people-related expenses; risks and uncertainties associated with intangible assets, including any future goodwill or intangible assets impairment charges; risk relating to our ability to protect our intellectual property rights; risks relating to acquisition, divestiture, joint venture or investment activities; the amount and timing of future dividends, which remain subject to Board approval and depend on market and other conditions; and other risks described in our reports filed from time to time&nbsp;with the Securities and Exchange Commission.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">We caution readers not to place undue reliance on any forward-looking statements included in this document, which speak only as of the date of this document. We undertake no responsibility to update these statements, except as required by law.</p>

<p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Note on Non-GAAP Financial Measures</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">This document includes certain non-GAAP financial measures, including adjusted EPS, organic net sales, adjusted gross profit, adjusted operating profit, adjusted SG&amp;A, adjusted corporate expenses, adjusted gross margin, adjusted operating margin, adjusted effective tax rate, adjusted net income attributable to Conagra Brands, free cash flow, net debt, net leverage ratio, and adjusted EBITDA. Management considers GAAP financial measures as well as such non-GAAP financial information in its evaluation of the company&#8217;s financial statements and believes these non-GAAP financial measures provide useful supplemental information to assess the company&#8217;s operating performance and financial position. These measures should be viewed in addition to, and not in lieu of, the company&#8217;s diluted earnings per share, operating performance and financial measures as calculated in accordance with GAAP.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Organic net sales excludes, from reported net sales, the impacts of foreign exchange, divested businesses and acquisitions, as well as the impact of any 53<sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">rd</sup> week. All references to changes in volume and price/mix throughout this release are on an organic net sales basis.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">References to adjusted items throughout this release refer to measures computed in accordance with GAAP less the impact of items impacting comparability. Items impacting comparability are income or expenses (and related tax impacts) that management believes have had, or are likely to have, a significant impact on the earnings of the applicable business segment or on the total corporation for the period in which the item is recognized, and are not indicative of the company&#8217;s core operating results. These items thus affect the comparability of underlying results from period to period.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">References to earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization (EBITDA) refer to net income attributable to Conagra Brands before the impacts of discontinued operations, income tax expense (benefit), interest expense, depreciation, and amortization. References to adjusted EBITDA refer to EBITDA before the impacts of items impacting comparability.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Hedge gains and losses are generally aggregated, and net amounts are reclassified from unallocated corporate expense to the operating segments when the underlying commodity or foreign currency being hedged is expensed in segment cost of goods sold. The net change in the derivative gains (losses) included in unallocated corporate expense during the period is reflected as a comparability item, Corporate hedging derivate gains (losses).</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><b><u>Note on Forward-Looking&nbsp;Non-GAAP Financial Measures</u></b></p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Our fiscal 2024 guidance includes certain non-GAAP financial measures (organic net sales growth, adjusted operating margin, adjusted EPS, net leverage ratio, and adjusted effective tax rate) that are presented on a forward-looking basis. Historically, the company has calculated these non-GAAP financial measures excluding the impact of certain items such as, but not limited to, foreign exchange, acquisitions, divestitures, restructuring expenses, the extinguishment of debt, hedging gains and losses, impairment charges, legacy legal contingencies, and unusual tax items. Reconciliations of these forward-looking non-GAAP financial measures to the most directly comparable GAAP financial measures are not provided because the company is unable to provide such reconciliations without unreasonable effort, due to the uncertainty and inherent difficulty of predicting the timing and financial impact of such items. For the same reasons, the company is unable to address the probable significance of the unavailable information, which could be material to future results.</p>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			<td id=".symb.3" style="width: 1%; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt; border-bottom: 3px double rgb(0, 0, 0);">$</td>
			<td id=".amt.3" style="width: 12%; text-align: right; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt; border-bottom: 3px double rgb(0, 0, 0);">39.0</td>
			<td id=".trail.3" nowrap="true" style="width: 1%; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt; border-bottom: 3px double rgb(0, 0, 0);">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">&nbsp;</p>

			<td id=".trail.8" nowrap="true" style="width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 8pt; margin-left: 0pt; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);"><i>)%</i></td>

		</tr>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 8pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">1 </sup>Operating profit is derived from taking Income from continuing operations before income taxes and equity method investment earnings, adding back Interest expense, net and removing Pension and postretirement non-service (income) expense.</p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 8pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">2</sup> Advertising and promotion expense (A&amp;P) has been removed from adjusted selling, general and administrative expense because this metric is used in reporting to management, and management believes this adjusted measure provides useful supplemental information to assess the company&#8217;s operating performance.&nbsp; Please note that A&amp;P is not removed from adjusted profit measures.</p>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

			<td id=".trail.B9" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 8pt; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);"><i><b>&nbsp;</b></i></td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 8pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">1 </sup>Operating profit is derived from taking Income from continuing operations before income taxes and equity method investment earnings, adding back Interest expense, net and removing Pension and postretirement non-service (income) expense.</p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 8pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">2</sup> Advertising and promotion expense (A&amp;P) has been removed from adjusted selling, general and administrative expense because this metric is used in reporting to management, and management believes this adjusted measure provides useful supplemental information to assess the company&#8217;s operating performance.&nbsp; Please note that A&amp;P is not removed from adjusted profit measures.</p>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;font-variant:normal;margin:0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<div class="PGFTR" style="text-align: center; width: 100%">
<div class="hf-row">
<div class="hf-cell PGNUM">&nbsp;</div>
</div>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 8pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">1 </sup>As of November&nbsp;26, 2023.</p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 8pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">3 </sup>Excludes comparability items attributable to noncontrolling interests.</p>

<p style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 8pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;"><sup style="vertical-align:top;line-height:120%;">4 </sup>The company defines its net debt leverage ratio as net debt divided by adjusted EBITDA for the trailing twelve month period.</p>

<p style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-variant: normal; margin: 0pt;">Reconciliation of Non-GAAP Financial Measures to Reported Financial Measures</p>

			<td style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</td>

<SEQUENCE>11
<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
